title: Checks and Balance; Biden's debacleâ€”what legacy does America leave in Afghanistan?
text:
The Economist's US editor John Prideaux hosts with Laurel Miller of the International Crisis Group; Dr Weeda Mehran, who grew up under the Taliban; James Astill, The Economist's Washington bureau chief and former Afghanistan reporter, and Jon Fasman, US digital editor. Runtime: 39 min

Listen on: Apple Podcasts | Spotify | Google | Stitcher | TuneIn

For access to The Economist's print, digital and audio editions subscribe: economist.com/USpod
